descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone, this is my personal FXAA Post process injector settings.

I tweaked it, so the game looks wonderful, lighty without losing realism.
You wont believe your eyes, it\'s simply amazing (thx to the author of FXAA!)
Take in consideration that i use a very large number of mods, to increase quality of textures etc.


[b]Installation instructions:[/b]

U need to download and install FXAA POST PROCESS INJECTOR version 1.3, installing the SETTING 1

Temporary u can download the version 1.3 of FXAA POST PROCESS INJECTOR from here http://modsreloaded.com/fxaa-post-process-injector

Simply extract the file into your game directory (where your TESV.EXE is located) replacing the old file.

p.s. Please endorse me if you liked it!
author: Enhok
